feature_defs.trigger: after you cast a sorcerer spell using a spell slot
effects: Once per turn, you can roll 1d20; on a 20, roll on the Wild Magic Surge table.
If the effect is a spell, it isnt affected by your Metamagic.

feature_defs.trigger: before you roll a d20 test
effects: You can gain advantage on the roll.
If you cast a sorcerer spell using a spell slot before finishing a long rest, you automatically roll on the Wild Magic Surge table.
limits: Once you use this feature, you must cast a sorcerer spell with a spell slot or finish a long rest before you can use it again.

feature_defs.trigger: immediately after another creature you can see rolls a d20 test
effects: You can spend 1 sorcery point to roll 1d4 and apply it as a bonus or penalty (your choice) to the roll.

feature_defs.trigger: when you roll on the Wild Magic Surge table
effects: You can roll twice and use either result.

feature_defs.trigger: immediately after you cast a sorcerer spell using a spell slot
effects: You can choose an effect from the Wild Magic Surge table instead of rolling (you cant choose the final row; if the effect requires a roll, you must make it).
limits: Once you use this feature, you cant do so again until you finish a long rest.
